members.name: Philipp Feindert
members.bio: Hi, Iâ€™m Philipp. My focus is always the WHY and the WHERE. As a former AI forecast and AI strategy expert at the Research Department of Mercedes-Benz, I translate the exponential pace of artificial intelligence into clear and human centered guiding principles.
members.mehrInfo: I prioritize the protection of unique economic value by ensuring that technology enhances organizational identity rather than replacing its human foundation. I bridge the gap between visionary strategys and todays execution to make the digital transformation feel safe, personal, and approachable.

timeline.desc: Strategic direction and AGI readiness frameworks.
Research Department: AI forecasting and strategic implementation.

members.name: Jan Junge
members.bio: Hi, I am Jan. My focus is always the HOW and the WHAT. As a former research and development engineer at the research department of Mercedes Benz, I transform complex technical innovation into reliable and industrial grade system.
members.mehrInfo: I build the technical implementation of the AGIRDYTM vision into industrial grade systems under the premise of absolute data sovereignty and security. I ensure the delivery of high performance results by utilizing the latest technological advancements to remain at the forefront of AGI readiness.

timeline.desc: Developing next-gen systems in the research department.
